name: Cabinet (Cabinet)
description: Cabinet (Cabinet); Roger Vandercruse Lacroix (French, 1727 - 1799, master 1755); Paris, France; about 1765; Oak and fir veneered with tulipwood, amaranth, and holly; gilt-bronze mounts; white marble interior shelf; 93.7 x 59.4 x 43.8 cm (36 7/8 x 23 3/8 x 17 1/4 in.); 70.DA.81; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
